habitat_description: First described by Bishop and Wright (1937), this species occupies a spring at Helotes in Bexar County, north of the city of San Antonio. Recently, Chippindale et al. (2000) have assigned the restricted distribution of this species to several springs in Bexar and Kendall counties. This species is completely aquatic and individuals have only been reported from spring outflows, in the gravel substrate, or under rocks or leaves. This species retreats to subterranean crannies during unfavorable conditions (Green et al. 2013).
